title: [Caligos Isle, High Plateau]
description: Descending from high above and disappearing deep into the cobblestone path, a large ragged fissure cracks the black mountain's face and is filled with grooved brain coral that emits a soft glow in the silvery moonlight that pierces the pervading mist.  Protrusions of dark, spongy seaweed fingers spill forth from between the rock wall, its inhabitants completely blanketing the area in its prolific growth.

Descending from high above and disappearing deep into the cobblestone path, a large ragged fissure cracks the black mountain's face and is filled with grooved brain coral that emits a soft glow in the murky sunlight.  Protrusions of dark, spongy seaweed fingers spill forth from between the rock wall, its inhabitants completely blanketing the area in its prolific growth.
